text:
Oh, you two are studying together?
That's impressive...!

Not really...
I'm just keeping Kiriko company.

Hehe... Mamimi-chan...
You finish English so quickly...

Oh... Producer-san...
Do you have a favorite subject...?

Stories from textbooks
seem to stick in your memory even as adults.

Turning stories into memories...
is really wonderful...

Yeah... the world...
Even in places other than here, someone is always living...

That's true...
History somehow feels romantic, doesn't it...!

W-Well, it's not like I particularly like it...
Then, why don't you say something?
